name: Clarion Collection Hotel Valdemars

reviews.text: The renovations at this hotel are nearly complete and they have been carried out with excellent attention to detail and a strong sense of design. My stay here was very comfortable and enjoyable.
reviews.title: Great hotel, nice renovation, friendly staff- Highly Recommend the place!

reviews.text: The rates are reasonable (maybe even cheap?), the design and equipment of the rooms very well thought out, and the staff friendly and attentive. As for design, the owners (one of whom I happened to meet on my stay) were originally Latvian, but emigrated to Sweden. It is a family run place and feels like it (in a good way). There is a distinct stamp of Swedish modernist design on the place, complete with some furnishings from Ikea, hardwood floors in the room (a nice touch!), and interesting pale green, beige paint colors (finally a hotel room with some color variation/texture!). All in all, very nice materials used in the interiors.
reviews.title: An ok hotel

reviews.text: The high tech flat-screen TV worked well with a good range of channels. There was Internet available in the rooms via an Ethernet connection (and it was fast and free). The smart-chip door key worked every time (unlike finicky magnetic stripe keys). The room had a fresh flower, a comfortable bed, a generously sized shower and nice wooden details in the bathroom, foyer and room.
reviews.title: nice budget hotel
Good budget hotel in the heart of Riga
reviews.text: One shortcoming of the room is the lack of a minibar, though I understand that they are planning to add minibars once the rest of the renovation is completed.

description: At Hotel Valdemar you live in comfort and style in the heart of Riga's history and culture. The over 100 year old house is an example of Riga's unique Art Nouveau architecture and total renovated in 2006.Hotel Valdemar is located in central Riga, only a few minutes walk from Old Town. On the tranquil courtyard, you can during the summer months enjoy a cup of coffee in the sun, while the one million city of Riga pulsates just outside.We want to take good care of our guest we therfore offer all our guest complimentary breakfast, homemade waffles in the afternoon and evening meal between 18:00 and 21:00.
